PluginData.Author: Pas2704
PluginData.Tooltip: Lets you keep track of admin abilities being used on the server.
PluginData.Description: Lets you keep track of admin abilities being used on the server. More specifically, it can keep track of players using: Invulnerable, ShowPlayers, UseTerminals, Untargetable, KeepOriginalOwnershipOnPaste, IgnoreSafezones, IgnorePCU It also shows what abilities are currently in use in your shift + f11 menu. Changes are tracked with local chat messages, but will only work in multiplayer games where you are not the host.
